https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif._instruction: Enter the identifier for software source code artefacts provided by the Software Heritage archive ('SoftWare Heritage persistent IDentifier'; SWHID) as an internationalized resource identifier (IRI) following the defined pattern (i.e., 'https://archive.softwareheritage.org/' + SWHID).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.label: Identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/identif.name: identifier
